segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is, standing in that puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying that plate like nothing else is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn around and see what the children are up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing and making such a mess, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's going to notice the water before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so peaceful and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall off that stool; it looks really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is quite tense, with so many potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't noticed anything yet; she's really oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
